nodes.text: The Nova Razors was a spice gang that operated during the Imperial Era on Bestine IV and became the planet's most ruthless gang. They were headquartered in Bsellis City and were under the protection of corrupt Bestine Security Force officer Sergeant Mey Kilrow. The young boy Hawk was a member of the gang, although reluctantly. The gang was led by a Twi'lek and consisted of the Twi'leks's lieutenants and their Dowutin bodyguards among others.
